ExportSentinels.name: Venari
ExportSentinels.description: Khora's loyal Kavat. Her constant companion and protector.

ExportSentinels.name: Wyrm
ExportSentinels.description:
With 'Assault Mode' and 'Crowd Dispersion' as default Precepts, Wyrm is a highly offensive Sentinel. Wyrm also comes with a laser rifle.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

ExportSentinels.name: Taxon
ExportSentinels.description:
With 'Assault Mode' and 'Molecular Conversion' as default Precepts, Taxon protects its owner with shield restoration. Equipped with the Artax ice-beam.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

ExportSentinels.name: Shade
ExportSentinels.description:
With 'Revenge' and 'Ghost' as default Precepts, Shade is well suited for stealth gameplay. Shade also comes with a burst laser pistol.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

ExportSentinels.name: Oxylus
ExportSentinels.description:
With 'Scan Aquatic Lifeforms' and 'Scan Matter' as default Precepts, Oxylus was designed to assist in Search-and-Rescue operations through the harsh landscape around The Orb Vallis. Oxylus also comes with a Multron rifle.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

ExportSentinels.name: Prisma Shade
ExportSentinels.description: A rare jewel of the void. How could anything so beautiful be crafted for stealth?

ExportSentinels.name: Wyrm Prime
ExportSentinels.description: Both bodyguard and status symbol, the Wyrm Prime Sentinel was the last line of defense for high ranking Tenno in the Orokin Era.

ExportSentinels.name: Helios Prime
ExportSentinels.description: This knowledge hungry protector defends its master with Deconstructor Prime.

ExportSentinels.name: Dethcube Prime
ExportSentinels.description:
With 'Assault Mode' and 'Vaporize' as default precepts, Dethcube Prime is the apex of lethal support. Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle Prime weapon.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

ExportSentinels.name: Carrier Prime
ExportSentinels.description: This ornate sentinel is an excellent example of late Orokin craftsmanship and styling.

ExportSentinels.name: Helios
ExportSentinels.description:
With 'Investigator' as its unique Precept and 'Deconstructor' as its weapon, the versatile Helios Sentinel acts as both a lethal guardian and an automatic codex scanner. Scans require an equipped Codex Scanner and an available charge.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

ExportSentinels.name: Djinn
ExportSentinels.description:
With 'Thumper' and 'Fatal Attraction' as default Precepts, Djinn is a combat Sentinel. Djinn also comes with a poison dart weapon.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

ExportSentinels.name: Nautilus
ExportSentinels.description:
With 'Auto Omni' and 'Cordon' as default Precepts, this Sentinel is the ideal companion for long voyages aboard a Railjack.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

ExportSentinels.name: Dethcube
ExportSentinels.description:
With 'Assault Mode' and 'Vaporize' as default precepts, Dethcube acts exactly as advertised, as a badass cube of 'deth'. Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle weapon.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

ExportSentinels.name: Carrier
ExportSentinels.description:
With 'Assault Mode' and 'Ammo Case' as default Precepts, Carrier is a seeker Sentinel. Carrier also comes with a shotgun weapon.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

ExportSentinels.name: Diriga
ExportSentinels.description:
Diriga shocks nearby enemies, and picks off distant threats, utilizing the Vulklok sniper rifle and the 'Calculated Shot', 'Arc Coil' and 'Electro Pulse' precepts.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

ExportSentinels.name: Chesa Kubrow
ExportSentinels.description: This Kubrow will disarm adversaries and retrieve the spoils of battle.

ExportSentinels.name: Sunika Kubrow
ExportSentinels.description: Once the value of Orokin guard-pets had been realized, Orokin scientists began experimenting with strains designed for combat. These were no longer household pets but superior war animals bred for ferocity and aggression.

ExportSentinels.name: Raksa Kubrow
ExportSentinels.description: Designed by the Orokin to be the perfect companion, a Kubrow was never far from its master's side. Loyal and obedient, these creatures made ideal bodyguards. Equipped with shield generators for added protection, their fierce growl could paralyze any attacker with fear.

ExportSentinels.name: Huras Kubrow
ExportSentinels.description: Prized for its ability to sneak up on unsuspecting prey, the Huras Kubrow were first used as hunting companions by the Orokin elite. Orokin Era Tenno soon adapted the strain for use in covert missions and assassinations.

ExportSentinels.name: Helminth Charger
ExportSentinels.description: An Infested pet bred from the Helminth Cyst

ExportSentinels.name: Sahasa Kubrow
ExportSentinels.description: Enterprising Orokin genetic designers recognized that the Kubrow's affinity for games of fetch could be used for more serious endeavors. They soon developed a strain adept at reconnaissance and contraband recovery. Tenno often used the creatures to help resupply while in the field.

ExportSentinels.name: Vasca Kavat
ExportSentinels.description: A true child of the night, and a drinker of life.

ExportSentinels.name: Adarza Kavat
ExportSentinels.description: Piercing eyes reflect deadly instincts.

ExportSentinels.name: Smeeta Kavat
ExportSentinels.description: This sly feline is playful yet devious.

ExportSentinels.name: Sly Vulpaphyla
ExportSentinels.description: Fast and foxy, Vulpaphyla are agile allies to bring along on your next adventure.

ExportSentinels.name: Vizier Predasite
ExportSentinels.description: These hard-charging, four-legged predators make formidable companions when in the field.

ExportSentinels.name: Pharaoh Predasite
ExportSentinels.description: These hard-charging, four-legged predators make formidable companions when in the field.

ExportSentinels.name: Medjay Predasite
ExportSentinels.description: These hard-charging, four-legged predators make formidable companions when in the field.

ExportSentinels.name: Crescent Vulpaphyla
ExportSentinels.description: Fast and foxy, Vulpaphyla are agile allies to bring along on your next adventure.

ExportSentinels.name: Panzer Vulpaphyla
ExportSentinels.description: Fast and foxy, Vulpaphyla are agile allies to bring along on your next adventure.
